securityTokenOffering: とは何ですか STO（セキュリティトークンオファリング）?
aSecurityTokenOfferingSto: A Security Token Offering (STO) is the cryptographic tokenization of your capital providing investors with a digital share of your company.
securityTokens: Security Tokens are defined as financial securities in accordance with the Howey test and empower investors with financial benefits such as:
